title: Firecracker Jinx Unavailable
body: Hello! I was so excited about the firecracker jinx skin, only to flip to it, and find that it was unavailable. I am a complete noob when it comes to skin releases. My question is - Why would they include the new skin in the patch, and not make it available for sale? Does anyone know when it will be available for purchase?

replies.body:
Hi there! 

Not all content is unlocked on the first day of the patch! Firecracker Jinx, Warring Kingdoms Nidalee and Warring Kingdoms Katarina will be available a bit later this patch. :]

I'm saying sometime next week since that's when they should do it ;)


though I always wonder why the content isn't always released the first day, because other MOBAs like SMITE release their new content immediately with each patch.
For some content, it's because it's tied to an in game event. In Jinx's case, she's tied to the Lunar Revel! :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=PTdYOu3X,comment-id=000200010001,timestamp=2015-02-02T17:43:17.414+0000)
>
> For some content, it's because it's tied to an in game event. In Jinx's case, she's tied to the Lunar Revel! :]

I just thought of a question for that. What day is usually Lunar Reveal?? =P I don't think I'm familiar with this particular holiday.
It varies - last year it was on February 8th, so it'll be somewhere around then this year!
No. Last year the Lunar Revel started on January 28th.  2013 it started on February 8th :)
Don't mind me, I don't know what year it is. D:
Does anyone ever know? XD
This gives me hope! Would also explain why saturday felt more quiet than usual XD

Okie dokie. Thanks.

You learn something new everyday, and I learned that Lunar Reveal seems to be a legit holiday that I never knew about before. Sounds about right. heh

it will be around the 17th/18th of Feb this year, because the Lunar revel event happens on/around the chinese new year,  and it just so happens that this new year falls on patch day/content release day ^^

> [{quoted}](name=Atsuri,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=PTdYOu3X,comment-id=0002000100010001000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-06T14:54:08.089+0000)
>
> it will be around the 17th/18th of Feb this year, because the Lunar revel event happens on/around the chinese new year,  and it just so happens that this new year falls on patch day/content release day ^^

I very much doubt that, that's like releasing a Christmas skin on Christmas day. It will be a week or so before Chinese new year. Like the riot post on the previous page, last year was February the 8th and will be a similar date this year.

Well I get that, but some that AREN'T part of an event get pushed to the middle of no where for their release. Like the recent Bloodmoon {{champion:412}} & {{champion:60}}. They were made last year, put in the game last year but weren't actually made available till this year.
no they waited for the Snowdown to be over. It wasn't in themiddle of no where, but just after an already going event.
In order to release a bloodmoon skin, you must wait for a red moon.
because Hi-Rez is smarter than Riot
Yes, this a know :P

ya Riot basically jingles keys with their skins with limited times till gone pressuring you to spend money Hi-Rez they are just like HERE YOU GO they will always be there (minus some holiday skins but thats not that bad) for when you are able to get them
I lose interest in skin because I have to wait for too long =\
Thank you! But a date would be super-fantastic!
They never give dates out like that. It's always "at a later time". =P
or "sometime next patch" ;)
This is because there is always a way to make a skin better for your enjoyment. They just want you to want it more. :)
they just want you to want it teasing you to make money off you
Well the vent the Lunar Revel is based on happens February 19th, so it could be then. Just a guess though.
{{champion:222}} I already got my money down for this skin. just hoping it comes out soon... REALLY soon.
I really hope she will be 975 on release like arclight vel'koz because I have 1313
sucks for you dude she's 1350. Unless skins ALWAYS go on sale first week....that has never happened for me before though.

Me too.


Patience....
Ditto
yea, just be patient...should be out sometime later this week or next.  Looking forward to both that one and Warring Kingdoms Nidalee...and I don't even play Nid lol.
Ugh, patience. I have waited my whole life for this skinnnnnnnnnnnn! lol.
**"Paaatience"** -{{champion:107}}
I felt the same with Bloodmoon Elise. It hurts, but at least this time it will hopefully be out for Lunar Revel, which as I recall is supposed to relate to Chinese New Year which is on Febuary 20th.
Riot what have you done. Listen to our pray. WE WANT IT NOW
This skin is WAY over due.
soo... she hasn't been out yet because i'm getting really frustrated weather i missed out on firecracker jinx or not
Firecracker {{champion:222}}  is a permanent skin, so don't worry. ;)
is this the same with the new kata and nidalee skins? (warring kingdoms)

> [{quoted}](name=ozyrus123,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=PTdYOu3X,comment-id=000c00000000,timestamp=2015-02-08T19:28:37.253+0000)
>
> is this the same with the new kata and nidalee skins? (warring kingdoms)

Yup.

Odd how I don't see many people clamoring for those skins, but I see a lot of "FIRECRACKER JINX WHERe?"
WHERE IS IT ;_; QwQ STILL WAITING RITO I THREW 500€ IN YA FACE WHERE IS IT :(
But I want her now >.< So awesome ;_;

I logged on hoping for the new Jinx skin and the new Annie skin... to find that I couldn't buy it too... #iCried  #SavedUpForNoReason but really, will we be able to buy it or will it stay unavailable? On google images ppl were using the new skin. I'm kinda confused.{{champion:21}}
Odds are you saw pictures taken from the PBE. Never fear, all of these skins are still on the way. Most of them are tied to holidays and/or events, such as Lunar Revel (Chinese New Year).

> [{quoted}](name=xX BambiBoo Xx,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=PTdYOu3X,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-01-31T09:22:07.466+0000)
>
> I logged on hoping for the new Jinx skin and the new Annie skin... to find that I couldn't buy it too... #iCried  #SavedUpForNoReason but really, will we be able to buy it or will it stay unavailable? On google images ppl were using the new skin. I'm kinda confused.{{champion:21}}

Well the Annie skin was announced to be released closer to Valentines Day along with Heartseeker Varus. I don't know about all the other skins though. And the Google images was probably people in PBE posting screenshots of them when they were testing her out for bugs and what not.
Annoying, it doesn't even mention the skin on the Lunar Reveal page.
i was wondering to but most likely on chinese new year but not a 100%

cuz chinese new year is coming soon, just wait a few days guys.
it looks awesome, I'm so going to buy it. lol

On the PBE and in the SkinSpotlight's preview video, several have noticed the upcoming Firecracker Jinx skin is missing the unique sound effects for her mini gun.

Riot Katey Khaos tweeted out that this is a bug and, while it won't be fixed for her release during 5.2, it will be added back in very soon.
"Firecracker Jinx not playing new mini-gun sound is a bug! It won't be fixed for release, but we'll be adding the sounds back in!"
they are going to be released a lil bit later in the week. it happens often
